description: Select 'Tamil' script. Verify workspace loads with correct character grid.
Enable Autosave. Draw a shape. Refresh. Click 'Restore Session'. Verify drawing exists.
Click 'New Empty Project'. Enter name 'TestFont', UPM 2048. Verify empty grid with correct UPM in settings.
On mobile viewport, click the floating 'Grid' button. Verify Nav Drawer slides in from left.
Open Mobile Drawer. Click backdrop. Verify Drawer slides out.
On mobile, open Drawing Editor. Select a path. Verify Contextual Toolbar appears at bottom and is horizontally scrollable.
Press Ctrl+K (or Cmd+K). Verify palette modal opens.
Open Palette. Type 'ka'. Verify 'ka' glyph appears in results. Select it. Verify editor opens.
Open Palette. Type 'Spacing'. Verify 'Kerning Workspace' appears (alias check).
Open Palette. Type 'U+0041'. Verify 'A' appears.
Type 'settings'. Use Up/Down arrows to highlight 'Settings'. Press Enter. Verify Settings modal opens.
Select Pen. Click points to form a shape. Close shape by clicking start point. Verify filled shape.
Select Calligraphy. Draw a stroke. Toggle angle (45/30/15) via toolbar. Draw again. Verify stroke contrast changes.
Draw a circle. Select Slice tool. Drag line across circle. Verify circle splits into two paths.
Draw a path. Select Eraser. Drag over path. Verify segment is removed/split.
Select a path. In Contextual Toolbar, type '45' in Rotate field. Press Enter. Verify path rotates 45deg.
Select a path. Click 'Flip Horizontal' icon in toolbar. Verify geometry mirrors.
Click 'Select' (Batch) icon in header. Click 3 glyph cards. Verify counter shows '3 selected'.
Select 2 glyphs in Batch mode. Click 'Transform'. Enter Scale 1.5. Click Apply. Verify glyphs scaled up.
Select multiple glyphs. Click 'Edit Properties'. Set LSB to 100. Save. Verify LSB updated for all.
Select glyphs. Click 'Delete'. Confirm modal. Verify glyphs cleared.
Open a Base+Mark pair. Drag the mark on canvas. Verify coordinates update in toolbar.
In Positioning Toolbar, type '50' in X input. Press Enter. Verify mark moves.
Move a mark for a Class Leader (Crown icon). Verify 'Updated X dependent pairs' notification appears.
Load script with dual classes (Base & Mark). Open a pair belonging to both. Toggle 'Sync via Base' / 'Sync via Mark' tabs. Verify active class context switches.
Click 'Link' icon to break sync. Move mark. Verify 'Exception' badge appears.
Open a pair. Drag right glyph. Verify kerning value updates.
In toolbar, set 'X-Dist' to 50. Verify kerning value recalculates to achieve 50 unit gap.
Click 'Auto-kern' in header. Verify progress modal appears and values populate.
Open Rules. Go to Groups tab. Click 'Add Group'. Enter name 'myGroup', members 'a, b'. Save. Verify group appears.
Try creating group '@vowels' (if '$vowels' exists). Verify error notification 'Name already exists'.
In 'Features' tab, click 'Up' arrow on a lookup. Verify order changes.
Click 'Export FEA'. Verify .fea file downloads.
Go to Settings -> Editor. Enter valid TTF URL for Guide Font. Verify background guide updates in editor.
Toggle Dark Mode. Verify UI colors invert correctly.
Click 'Import Glyphs'. Select a project file. Choose 'Fill' vs 'Overwrite' for a specific glyph. Import. Verify logic held.
Menu -> Take Snapshot. Modify glyph. Menu -> Restore Snapshot. Verify original state returned.
Create glyph 'B' as link to 'A'. Modify 'A'. Verify 'B' updates automatically.
Select a linked glyph. Double-click on the path. Verify edit mode is NOT entered (locked).
Unlink glyph 'B' (was linked to 'A'). Modify 'B'. Verify 'A' remains unchanged.
Try to link 'A' to 'B' where 'B' is already linked to 'A'. Verify error/prevention.
In Rule Details, manually position 3 pairs. Click 'Reset Page'. Verify all 3 revert to default positions.
In Rule Details, click 'Accept Page'. Verify unpositioned items are marked as positioned/accepted.
Draw a path. Move a point. Press Ctrl+Z. Verify point moves back. Press Ctrl+Shift+Z. Verify point moves forward.
Select a point. Press Right Arrow. Verify point moves 1 unit right. Hold Shift+Right Arrow. Verify 10 unit move.
Try to delete a group that is used in a positioning rule. Verify warning message.
Drag and drop an SVG file onto a glyph card. Verify SVG path is imported into the glyph.
Open Creator Studio. Type 'Hello World'. Verify text updates on canvas.
Click 'Story' preset. Verify canvas aspect ratio changes to portrait.
Upload a background image. Verify it appears on canvas.
Open Comparison View. Select 'Vowels' category. Verify vowel glyphs appear on canvas.
Click Zoom In button. Verify glyphs render larger.
Toggle 'Fold Lines'. Verify layout switches between grid and single line.
Open Test Page. Type text. Verify it renders using the current font.
Adjust Font Size slider. Verify text size changes.
Change Grid Size in settings. Open Editor. Verify grid cell size.
Open Image Tracer modal. Verify preview area is empty.
Trace an image and click Insert. Verify paths added to glyph.
Rename a group in Rules Manager. Verify the new name persists.
Click 'Save as Template'. Verify JSON download.
Try to export empty font. Verify 'Incomplete Font' warning.
Click 'Test Font'. Verify Test Page opens.
Click 'Save As'. Enter new name. Verify project saved.
Add 'Basic Latin' block. Verify glyphs added to grid.
Add custom glyph 'myLogo'. Verify it appears in grid.
Change LSB in properties panel. Verify spacing updates.
Change glyph type to 'Ligature'. Add components 'f', 'i'. Save.
